comment: Grindel Is an *amazing* person but needs to drastically change her teaching structure/strategy. I'm not one to whine about grades, but when I'm considered one of the best in the class by my classmates and I'm struggling to get my grade from a 79 to an 80, I can only imagine how it is for people who aren't natural writers. Avoid if you can.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Graded by few things--Tough grader

comment: Grindel is a very fun professor who will respect you and give good feedback. Her grading is very tough though. If you are in desperate need of an A, I would not recommend, but if you're up for a challenge her class is a must.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Accessible outside class--Tough grader

comment: Professor Grindel is great, but she's not easy. If you apply yourself, do the reading, and take care doing the writing assignments, you will pass. However, she is a very tough grader. To make up for it, she gives you tons of feedback and, sometimes, second chances at assignments. If you stay on your toes, her course is doable and she's wonderful.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Lots of homework--Accessible outside class

comment: professor was so rude to her students and talks to you like you are a child. this class was based off her opinion and her opinion only. DO NOT TAKE HER!
Very harsh grader. She likes things her way and her way only. If you do not say word for word what she wants it is wrong. Would not take again, and she assigns a lot of homework.

Professor Grindel is one of my favorite professors! Her class is not easy but she responds quickly to emails and really wants to help if you are having trouble. She cares about her students a lot! Her class is very organized and I knew what was expected of me. Highly recommend!!

This class is not an easy A. She makes you work for your grade but is super helpful and will help with whatever she can. She cares about her students and their grades. This is one of the few classes that I have actually learned something from. I would for sure take her again.

Taking Prof. Grindel for COM2135 is NOT for the feint of heart. She is clear about the expectations, and it's difficult work. Top marks for really caring about her students both in and out of class. It's most difficult because you read the text book, then immediately take a quiz. Pay attention and ask for help, even if you don't think you need it.

I would be turned off by some of her ratings, but TAKE HER. I dont rate professors but she deserves it. This class is hard in general, but she is so willing to help students. SHE is the reason i passed the SOCM entrance exam with a 90 my first time. go to her study sessions, go to class, and SHOW HER you care!!! Take her you wont regret it.
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Dr. Grindel is a great professor. yes she is strict and a tough grader but I would still recommend her. She's in charge and writes the entrance exam so taking her gives you an idea of what to expect and you'll also get help from the person in charge. the work isn't overwhelming, the writing assignments are short, practice worksheets and few quizzes

Grindle is the best prof! She is hilarious and is so respected in her field. Thanks to her I was able to pass my Com entrance exam with no problem and helped me really understand the content. Go to her drop in sessions!!! she really cares for her students!

Professor Grindel is and will forever be one of my favorite professors. Every whining review on this site is negative because those people are either lazy, bad at reading and writing, or just stupid. I can't believe what they're saying - Professor Grindel is one of the kindest people I've ever met, and she is a GREAT teacher who genuinely cares.

Her teaching style is horrible. She will give you practice assignments after practice assignments but will expect you to do them on your own. She thinks that by doing assignments on our own and getting a grade back for them is helpful. Then when the graded assignments come, you're screwed. The writing center can't even help you with her assignments
rating_tags: Lots of homework--So many papers--Tough grader

comment: I took Grindel back in 2015 and still despise her as a professor. She was an exceptionally harsh grader and does not prepare her students for real world use of APA style (I would know - my current job is APA style heavy and no where near as difficult as she makes it for assignments). Also lies about extra credit and retracts it after submission.

Professor Grindel is great! If you're looking to take the entrance exam for a Com related major, definitely take her because she wrote the exam. The class itself isn't easy, but she gives great feedback and always offers to review your work if you email her before it's due.

Terrible. Grades horrendously. Breif overview of subject then gives homework tgats worth more than quizzes. Doesnt explain why your wrong just marks it wrong. Has a terrible lisp and makes sitting in lectures awful. Makes you buy textbook she wrote to collect even more money from students cause tuition wasnt enough. DONT TAKE!!!
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Skip class? You won't pass.--Tough grader

comment: Prof. Grindel is a great person and a great professor. She is incredibly smart and funny. She is a tough grader, but also gives really good feedback. She definitely helped me become a better writer. I would take her again any day.

strictly speaking on teaching methods. grading scale is unclear and does not like to be questioned about it. lots of hw w/ a speedy overview. tests count for nothing and 2nd try writing assignments count for everything.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.
